SELECT B.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_LIST_PRICE, B.PUBLISHER_NO, BA.AUTHOR_NO, BA.AUTHOR_TYPE, A.AUTHOR_NAME, BI.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, P.PUBLISHER_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, SUM(BB.COUNT) AS SALES_COUNT
FROM BOOK B, BOOK_IMAGES BI, BOOK_AUTHOR BA, AUTHOR A, PUBLISHER P,CATEGORY C,BUY_BOOK BB,BUY WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BA.BOOK_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = BI.BOOK_NO AND BA.AUTHOR_NO = A.AUTHOR_NO AND B.PUBLISHER_NO = P.PUBLISHER_NO AND B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = BB.BOOK_NO AND BB.BUY_NO = BUY_NO
AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword}
AND C.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = #{cate})
AND BUY.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND BUY.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
AND BUY.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND BUY.BUY_DATE = CURRENT_DATE()
AND BUY.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_TOTAL_REPLY_CNT DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{recordSize};
